name: If a Tree Falls...
description:
Skinny Tim is dead.  Explore a gritty world and solve a crime with seemingly no clues and no witnesses.  But not everything is as it seems...

Made using ink for inkJam 2018.  This is my first shot at interactive fiction.  I saw the tools and thought it'd be fun to make a playable noir mystery where you're forced to take the perspective of the investigator, and I like how it came out!

The game runs in the web browser, just click "Run Game" above!  If you want to run it offline, you can optionally download it below.
